name: Kai Puolamäki
content: Kai PuolamÃ¤ki Welcome to my personal homepage. I am a Full Professor in computer science and atmospheric sciences (beginning September 2023) at the Department of Computer Science and Institute for Atmospheric and Earth System Research (INAR) at the University of Helsinki. I have a PhD in theoretical physics, and I hold a Title of Docent in computer science. From this site, you can find information about me, professional biography, contact information, and list of publications as well as my not-frequently-updated blog. Please also see my research group homepage. My old research homepage (old address) is for the time being archived for historical interest. You can also find (at least links to) miscellaneous material, including some historic web pages I created. Most recent blog posts 2021-01-02 Hacking OpenBSD server for the new year 2018-04-20 ICDE 2018 All blog posts
